meanings.definition: Having a series of steps or levels that resemble a staircase.
meanings.sent1: The stairstepped garden had different levels for each type of flower.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf was stairstepped, allowing easy access to each shelf.
meanings.sent3: The stairstepped cake had layers of different flavors, making it a delightful treat.
meanings.sent4: Her stairstepped hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall of curls.
meanings.sent5: The stairstepped design of the building made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Arranged in a manner that resembles a staircase.
meanings.sent1: The stairstepped pattern on the wall added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: The stairstepped display of photos created an interesting visual effect.
meanings.sent3: The stairstepped arrangement of chairs made the room look like a mini auditorium.
meanings.sent4: Her stairstepped necklace sparkled in the sunlight, drawing attention to her neckline.
meanings.sent5: The stairstepped layout of the garden path guided visitors through a scenic route.
